dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a mystical realm of wonder and magic.

dialogue.speaker: King Arin
dialogue.text: Greetings traveler, I am King Arin. I see you have arrived just in time to witness the celebration of our kingdom's prosperity.

dialogue.speaker: Mysterious Stranger
dialogue.text: (whispering) Don't be fooled by the king's warm words, traveler. There is darkness brewing in this land, and you would do well to beware.
